newsitem.title: USA: Standard Commercial offers 2.8 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Standard Commercial offers 2.8 mln shrs.

text.p: Standard Commercial Corp said Thursday it was making a public offering of 2.8 million shares at $16.75 each in order to raise money to reduce short-term debt.
The company, which has more than 9.4 million shares in circulation, said it was selling 2.8 million shares, while a shareholder was selling another 25,000 as part of the offer.
The New York Stock Exchange resumed trading in the stock after 10 a.m. (1400 GMT) after halting it earlier in the day.
The exchange said the first trade in the stock was a sale of 100 shares at 17-1/4.
Standard is a leaf and oriental leaf tobacco merchant.
